radiographic_examinations.findings: Large bilateral macronodular adrenal hyperplasia (left gland, 5535030 mm; right gland, 48325312 mm)
Pronounced concentric ventricular hypertrophy (septum wall, 16–20 mm; posterior wall, 12–14 mm)
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Regression of the concentric ventricular hypertrophy noted 18 months after surgery
